pullrequest.title: Don't shut down gazebo when removing a world -> gazebo7

content.raw:
another one ([details](https://gist.github.com/scpeters/cecc8f32309f93e9400af77458d71aa9))

A boost pointer assertion occurs while dereferencing a gazebo::physics::World pointer in the function gazebo::physics::worlds_running called from the gazebo::ServerFixture::RunServer thread.

In the main thread, gazebo::physics::remove_worlds has been called and it is waiting for topics to disappear.
content.html:
another one (details)

A boost pointer assertion occurs while dereferencing a gazebo::physics::World pointer in the function gazebo::physics::worlds_running called from the gazebo::ServerFixture::RunServer thread.

In the main thread, gazebo::physics::remove_worlds has been called and it is waiting for topics to disappear.
